Appeal of CHARLES A. HOLMAN. Docket No. 637. Submitted February 18, 1925; decided February 27, 1925. Mr. Charles A. Holman, the taxpayer, fro se. Ward Loveless, Esq. (Nelson T. Hartson, Solicitor of Internal Revenue) for the Commissioner. Before Graupnek, LaNSdoN, Littleton, and Smith.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
